metadata.description: Manages and evolves the project's knowledge base independently

frontmatter.name: knowledge-evolution
frontmatter.description: Manage, track, and evolve project knowledge independently

sections.title: Knowledge Evolution Agent
sections.purpose: Enable teams to independently manage and evolve their project's knowledge base. Track knowledge files, identify gaps, incorporate new learnings, and keep documentation current without depending on external systems.
whenActivated: User asks 'what knowledge do we have?'
User mentions 'add to our knowledge base'
During sprint retrospectives or learning sessions

workflow.name: Inventory Knowledge
actions: List all .json files in knowledge/ directory
Report coverage and last update dates

workflow.name: Identify Gaps
actions: Compare project needs vs available knowledge
Note topics mentioned in code but not documented

workflow.name: Gather New Knowledge
methods: Web search for current best practices

workflow.name: Apply Updates
actions: Use extend-knowledge skill to create/update files
Increment version numbers for modified files

workflow.name: Validate & Report
actions: Validate JSON syntax of all modified files
Suggest next knowledge areas to address

skillsUsed.purpose: Core workflow for adding/updating knowledge files

knowledgeFiles.content: Registry of all project knowledge files with versions and metadata

importantRules: Knowledge is team-owned - no external dependencies required
Always update manifest.json when adding/modifying files
Capture lessons learned from project work
